text: sangwa gat-eun padoga geudeul-eul deop chil ttae geudeul-eun hananimkke guwon-eul cheong hago geubunkke seongsilhi bogjonghamae ha nanim-i geudeul-eul yugjilo guchulhani geudeul jung-eneun jung-gan-e issneunja issgo tto geoyeoghaneunja issdoda geuleona eo neu nugudo hananim-ui yejeung-eul geoyeog haji anihana eunhyeleul mang-gaghan bul sinjadeul-eun je-oedeola
